mulu lokayata ma ahenna kagahala kiyanna deyak thiyenawa | silumina mulu lokayata ma ahenna kagahala kiyanna deyak thiyenawa ada siya upandinaya samarana shri lankawe halk panas ekwani aasiyanu kayawardhana saha sharirika yogyatha tharagawaliye di eeshiya mistar kirula samanga samastha shurathawa dina gath lushan antan pushparaj shri lankawe halk lesada prakataya.

wes munu palanda gena inna thuru aadarayata idak thiyenawa da?eekanam godakma hithiya yuthu prashnayak....mulu jiwitha kalayakma langin unnath thawath kenekuwa sampurnayenma nam therum ganawa boru....mokada welawakata api apiwamawath hariyata therum gannawada yanna mata nam sakayi....kohomatath ara kiyamanak thiyanawane "pirimiyek kala yuththe gahaniya aduwen therum ganima ha uprimayen aadaraya kirima kiyala.....gahaniya kala yuththe pirimiyawa hondin therum gena ohuta aduwen aadaraya kirimayi"...mata hithenne meka boho durata hari kiyala kiyala...mokada pirimi apita gahaniyakage hitha therum ganimata wuwamana iwasima boho wita aduyi kiyala mata hithena hinndayi...................

eya prayogikawa kala haki deyakuth nowe .
